name: nft-marketplace
description: A decentralized NFT marketplace built with React, Solidity, and MetaMask

scripts.prebuild: npm run compile && npm run copy-contracts
scripts.copy-contracts: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (!fs.existsSync('src/contracts')) fs.mkdirSync('src/contracts', {recursive: true}); fs.copyFileSync('artifacts/contracts/NFT.sol/NFT.json', 'src/contracts/NFT.json'); fs.copyFileSync('artifacts/contracts/NFTMarketplace.sol/NFTMarketplace.json', 'src/contracts/NFTMarketplace.json'); console.log('âœ… Contract artifacts copied');"
scripts.dev: npm run node & npm run setup && npm start
